CustomField.formula: IF( Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 1, Tehsil_Name__r.January_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 2, Tehsil_Name__r.February_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 3,Tehsil_Name__r.March_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 4,Tehsil_Name__r.April_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 5,Tehsil_Name__r.May_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 6, Tehsil_Name__r.June_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 7, Tehsil_Name__r.July_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 8, Tehsil_Name__r.August_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 9, Tehsil_Name__r.September_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 10, Tehsil_Name__r.October_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 11, Tehsil_Name__r.November_Area_Potential__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 12, Tehsil_Name__r.December_Area_Potential__c, 0) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
